description:
Physics Encyclopedia is the largest database about physics with more than 5900 articles.

The database is classified by field :

    * Acoustics
    * Astrophysics
    * Atomic physics
    * Computational physics
    * Condensed matter physics
    * Electromagnetism
    * Fundamental concepts
    * Mechanics
    * Molecular physics
    * Nuclear physics
    * Optical physics
    * Optics
    * Particle physics
    * Plasma physics
    * Quantum mechanics
    * Relativity
    * Statistical mechanics
    * Thermodynamics

 | Just type the first letters of a name, a date, a discovery,  … and Physics Encyclopedia will display the corresponding results.

Learn about science history with timelines for each physics field.

This application can also save bookmarks and share via SMS, email, facebook & twitter.
